credits.credits_text:
🎮 Game Development Team

👑 Lead Developer: Furkan Kırat
🎨 Game Design: Furkan Kırat & Efekan Kul
💻 Coding & Programming: Furkan Kırat & Efekan Kul
🎭 Graphic Design: Furkan Kırat & Efekan Kul
🛠️ Testing & QA: Furkan Kırat, Efekan Kul, Halil Efe Çelik, Enis Taşkın, Ege Eren Ceylan, Fatih Kınacı

🌟 Special Thanks
A huge thank you to:
💡 Halil Efe Çelik, Enis Taşkın, Ege Eren Ceylan, Fatih Kınacı
Your support and contributions have been invaluable!

🔧 Development Tools & Resources
☕ Java – Programming language
🖥️ Android Studio – UI & development
🗂️ GitHub – Version control

❤️ A Special Thanks to Our Players
We deeply appreciate all the players who contributed to the development of this game, provided feedback, and helped shape the experience. Your support means the world to us!

📜 License Information
This game is released under the Apache License, Version 2.0.
You are free to use, copy, modify, and distribute this game, even for commercial purposes, under the terms of the license.

📄 A copy of the license is available at:
🔗 https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

detective.name: Detective
detective.abilities: You choose one and see two roles, including that person's role

observer.name: Observer
observer.abilities: At night you can see which team a person belongs to

soul_binder.name: Soulbinder
soul_binder.abilities: You choose someone at night and if they get attacked, you prevent them from dying

stalker.name: Stalker
stalker.abilities: You choose a person and see who that person goes to at night
stalker.ability_message: Your target has visited {playerName} this night!
stalker.ability_message_nobody: Your target did not visit anybody this night!

psycho.name: Psycho
psycho.kill_message: You have slain your target successfully
psycho.kill_announcement: {playerName} ({roleName}) has been slain by a Psycho

dark_revealer.name: Dark Revealer
dark_revealer.abilities: At night you see someone's role

interrupter.name: Interrupter
interrupter.abilities: You can role block someone in the night

seal_master.name: Seal Master
seal_master.abilities: You can role block someone in the night

role_block.role_blocked_message: You have been role blocked this night
role_block.rb_immune_message: Someone tried to role block you but you are immune
role_block.role_block_message: You have role blocked your target

assassin.name: Assassin
assassin.attributes: You have basic defence and attack, you are immune to role blocking
assassin.kill_message: You have slain your target successfully
assassin.kill_announcement: {playerName} ({roleName}) has been slain by an Assassin

chill_guy.name: Chill Guy
chill_guy.abilities: Just simple person. You do nothing
chill_guy.attributes: If you reveal your role you will lose the game

last_joke.name: Last Joke
last_joke.abilities: When you die you will comeback to life and you must kill one player
last_joke.kill_message: You have successfully made your last joke to {playerName}
last_joke.kill_announcement: Someone made their Last Joke to {playerName} ({roleName})

disguiser.name: Disguiser
disguiser.abilities: Disguise to random role every night but you can't know until you use it
disguiser.kill_message: You have successfully killed your target
disguiser.kill_announcement: {playerName} ({roleName}) were killed by someone hiding in the shadows

dark_seer.name: Dark Seer
dark_seer.abilities: You see the role of two living people, but you cannot see the role owner
dark_seer.ability_message: The roles of the two currently living player in the play are: {roleName1} and {roleName2}
dark_seer.ability_message_one_left: The role of the currently living person in the play is: {roleName}
dark_seer.ability_message_no_left: There are not any players to see their role

blinder.name: Blinder
blinder.abilities: When you blind someone that player perform their ability randomly
blinder.ability_message: You have successfully blinded your target

folk_hero.name: Folk Hero
folk_hero.abilities: You make people immune others cannot visit your target
folk_hero.attributes: You can use your ability twice in a game
folk_hero.ability_message: You have successfully immunized your target

entrepreneur.name: Entrepreneur
entrepreneur.abilities: You have some money, you can get other people to do work with this money.
entrepreneur.kill_message: You have slain your target successfully
entrepreneur.kill_announcement: {playerName} ({roleName}) has been slain by an Entrepreneur

lore_keeper.name: Lore Keeper
lore_keeper.attributes: If the number of players in the game is 7 or less, you need to correctly guess the role of 2 players, if more, you need to guess the role of 3 players
lore_keeper.abilities: You choose a player and then you choose what role that player has, if you find it correctly player's role will be revealed.
lore_keeper.winning_true_guess_count: You have to guess %d roles correctly to win!

abilities.no_use_left: Your ability could not be used because you have reached your ability's maximum usage queue
abilities.defence: You could not slay your target because your attack was not powerful enough
abilities.no_role_selected: Your role could not be used because you did not select any role
abilities.no_ability_exists: Your ability could not be used because your role does not have the ability
abilities.heal: You have successfully protected your target
abilities.used_on: You tried to use your ability on: {playerName}
abilities.did_not_used: You did not used your ability on anybody

goals.folk: Find and execute all corrupters and neutrals
goals.lore_keeper: You try to guess the players' roles
goals.clown: You have to die at night by someone to win the game
goals.assassin: Kill every folk and corrupter member

voting.voted_for_none: You did not voted for anybody

role_book.chosen_player_text_night: You are using your ability on: {playerName}
role_book.chosen_player_text_night_no_ability: Your role does not have any active night ability
role_book.chosen_player_text_voting_nobody: You did not voted for anybody
role_book.rules_text:
Game Rules and Flow

1. Night Phase:
The game begins at night, and each player, in turn, takes the device to check their role.
Each player performs their assigned task according to their role and then passes the device to the next player.
The night phase ends once all players have used their abilities.

2. Day Phase:
In the day, each player takes the device in turn to see the results of the task performed by their role during the night.

After all players have reviewed their results, the device is returned to the first player, and the voting phase begins.

3. Voting Phase:
Before voting, players discuss and exchange ideas based on the information they gathered during the night. 
The voting is open, and each player cast their vote and pass the device to next player.
The player who receives more than half of the votes is eliminated.
After voting is complete, the game transitions back to the night phase, and this cycle continues.

Teams and Objectives

Folk:
Their goal is to ensure that, by the end of the game, all surviving players belong only to the Folk team.

Corrupted:
Their goal is to ensure that, by the end of the game, all surviving players belong only to the Corrupted team.

Neutral:
Neutral players have unique win conditions or tasks specific to their roles. Their goal is to achieve their individual objectives. For more information check the role guide.

player_names.all_players_ai_alert: All Players Cannot be AI Player!

hints.tooltip_username: Enter your username. It will be used to identify you in the game.
hints.tooltip_language: Select your preferred language for the game interface.
hints.tooltip_host_game: Create a game lobby and wait for players to join. All players must be on the same local network.
hints.tooltip_join_game: Join an existing game lobby. Make sure you are connected to the same local network as the host.
hints.tooltip_add_player: Add a new player to the game.
hints.tooltip_remove_player: Removes the selected player from the game.
hints.tooltip_start_game: Start the game when all players are ready. The game requires at least 5 and at most 10 players.
